channel.title: KetogenicFamily.com
channel.description: KetogenicFamily.com - Follow our progress towards a permanent ketogenic lifestyle

item.title: I am a lean person, why I quit a 5 day fast after only 4 days
item.description: What I learned attempting a prolonged fast as a lean person

item.title: Why we chose a ketogenic lifestyle
item.description: For years we struggled with low fat, high carb diets... until we discovered keto, and we've never looked back...

item.title: What is the ketogenic diet?
item.description: The ketogenic diet is a low carb, high fat diet designed to train your body to use fat for energy, break your sugar addiction and help you lose weight naturally

item.title: What role is food playing in my overall health and wellbeing?
item.description: Your body is a complex organic machine with many moving parts. Everything you consume, dietary food and drink, has a direct effect on your health.

item.title: Should you exercise when starting the ketogenic diet?
item.description: Exercising can be difficult for people when starting keto, because of the effects of the keto flu. When starting keto, you may consider taking a break from exercising or exercising with a friend for safety and to avoid injury.

item.title: What is the role of fasting on the ketogenic diet?
item.description: Fasting, when refraining from eating food and only drinking water for between 16 hours to several days, is a means of accelerating weight loss, and boosting ketone levels.
